CustomField.formula: CASE(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c, "Low",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-green.png", TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRisk__c) + ")", "Moderate",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-yellow.png", TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRisk__c) + ")", "High",IMAGE("/resource/OCE__ApolloIcons/png/flag-red.png", TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c)) + " " + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRiskLevel__c) + " (" + TEXT(OCE__ComplianceRisk__c) + ")", "")
CustomField.label: Compliance Risk Visualization
